content.question: All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: A point labeled P is marked near (1.5 comma negative 2.5) in quadrant 4. A line segment of length 3 is drawn from the origin to the point P and forms a line segment OP. The line segment OP makes an angle labeled negative pi over 3 with the positive x axis. ​The figure shows point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the complex plane. Which of the following complex numbers corresponds to the location of <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative fraction numerator 3 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction plus 3 over 2 i"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>i</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator 3 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction minus fraction numerator 3 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction i"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>i</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="3 over 2 minus fraction numerator 3 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction i"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>i</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="3 over 2 minus fraction numerator 3 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction i"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>i</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
